credit_line: Museum purchase, John B. Turner '24 Memorial Fund
title: Timothy Leary and Neal Cassady on Bus
inscriptions: Signed in margin at bottom: Neal Cassady meeting Timothy Leary first time on Merry Pranskter "Further" day-glo painted bus Neal'd driven cross-country & upstate to Millbrook N.Y., they came honking into the estate driveway & up to the house, Kesey & friends like a many-headed psychadelic monster in the quiet woodlands just raided for drugs by G. Gordon Liddy & local constabulary.  Neal scratching amphetamine itch in his driver's palm. Summer 1964.  Allen Ginsberg
